node.title: Bold fashion under blue skies at Flemington as crowds welcomed back for Melbourne Cup
node.alt: A woman wearing a red dress, white hat and sunglasses at the races.
node.description: For the first time since the COVID-19 pandemic began,Â thousands of Melbourne Cup fans descend on Flemington to watch in person the race that stops a nation.
node.content:
["Punters are flowing into\u00a0Flemington Racecourse under sunny skies, as the venue welcomes back 10,000\u00a0revellers\u00a0for the 2021 Melbourne Cup.", "After the pandemic essentially\u00a0stopped Melbourne for more than 18\u00a0months, Victoria's COVID-19 restrictions have eased just in time for the race that stops the nation.", "While 70 per cent of spectators at Flemington will be Victoria Racing Club (VRC) members, only\u00a05\u00a0per cent of tickets were offered\u00a0to the public, which equates to a few hundred ticketholders.", "The rest of the crowd will be made up of horse owners, corporate sponsors and trainers.", "", "
Eager racegoers have been streaming through the gates at Flemington Racecourse this morning.(AAP: Con Chronis)
", "This morning, VRC chair Neil Wilson said not all of the general admission tickets had been sold, which he attributed to the uncertainty created by the pandemic.", "\"A lot of people went away, a lot of people had made plans, they weren't sure what was happening, so we're not surprised, it's just a different environment with having the 10,000 cap,\" he said.", "It will be more festive than\u00a0last year's race, when crowds were banned from attending because of Melbourne's second COVID-19 wave, but\u00a0it will still have\u00a0a different atmosphere to previous events.", "Punters must be fully vaccinated, wear a mask indoors and\u00a0be seated to eat and drink, and they have been divided into three separate zones.", "\"It's been quite unusual for horses in the last 18 months in Australia,\" said jockey Craig Williams, who is riding his 19th Cup on Spanish Mission.", "\"To actually have noise and crowds and emotion at the races,\u00a0I think a lot of it is going to be a big benefit\u00a0for the horses if they can handle the day and the heat leading into the race.", "", "
Varinder Kumar\u00a0is attending the Melbourne Cup for the first time and says he was \"lucky to get a ticket\".(ABC News: Dylan Anderson\u00a0)
", "Cup fans who were not lucky enough to get a ticket can hold their own celebrations under Victoria's recently eased COVID-19 restrictions.", "Up to 10 people, including dependents, can watch the race in private homes and\u00a030 can meet for picnics and barbecues in public spaces.", "Hospitality venues such as cafes, restaurants and pubs will be open and\u00a0can have fully vaccinated, seated patrons, subject to density limits.", "
Crowds frock up for sunbathed cup
", "Punters have been treated to the warmest Melbourne Cup Day in years, with the spring sunshine tipped to peak around 30 degrees Celsius later this afternoon.", "The crowds are smaller than usual, with just 10,000 allowed at the venue, which has capacity for 120,000 people,\u00a0but the atmosphere was still joyous.", "", "
Singer Delta Goodrem makes a bold statement in colour at the 2021 Melbourne Cup.(AAP: Con Chronis)
", "After a long absence of live entertainment in Victoria, some big\u00a0names in Australian entertainment will perform around\u00a0Flemington Racecourse.", "ARIA award-winner Delta Goodrem is this year's official VRC Ambassador and the cast of Moulin Rouge! The Musical\u00a0will perform on the front lawn following the running of the Cup.", "", "
Crowds dressed up for the first Melbourne Cup with crowds since 2019.(ABC News: Dylan Anderson)
", "", "
Melissa Angell said she \"wanted to sparkle in the sun\".(ABC News: Dylan Anderson)
", "Celebrations are happening across the city, with many people coming together for the first time in months under the new eased restrictions.\u00a0", "Rosalie Barber is at the Smith in Prahran, where around 100 people are enjoying a mask-free afternoon in the venue's atrium.", "", "
Rosalie Barber is at the Smith in Prahran enjoying\u00a0\"bevs with good friends\"\u00a0for the first time since June.\u00a0(ABC News\u00a0)
", "\"It's beautiful, I missed this so much,\" she said.", "\"The last time we all went out was definitely more than four months ago, so way too long.\"", "The Smith's venue manager Dylan Hewlett said when the race starts the TVs will be on \"live and loud\".\u00a0", "\"The energy is high. People are just happy to come back and socialise and give back to the community,\" he said.\u00a0", "Outside Flemington there has been a different mood, with police arresting\u00a0nine protestors demonstrating against the running of the Melbourne Cup.", "Police says several protestors tried to chain themselves to a truck loaded with manure, before officers made the arrests and took them all into custody.", "The driver of the truck was also arrested.", "
Internationals to challenge local favourite Incentivise
", "The horses are scheduled to jump in race 7, the $8 million Melbourne Cup, around 3pm\u00a0AEDT.", "Star stayer Incentivise headed into the first Tuesday in November\u00a0as\u00a0the shortest-priced Melbourne Cup favourite since Phar Lap in 1929.", "It has been a rapid rise for the Peter Moody-trained gelding which\u00a0was well beaten in a maiden race at Toowoomba just seven months ago, but has\u00a0since won nine straight races.", "Last year's winner, Twilight Payment, returns for another crack.", "In 2020, the Irish gelding\u00a0dominated from the front to give owner Lloyd Williams his seventh Cup.", "", "
Jockey Jye McNeil rides Twilight Payment to victory in the 2020 Melbourne Cup.(AAP: James Ross)
", "The nine-year-old will\u00a0again be ridden by jockey Jye McNeil, who said he was\u00a0looking forward to racing\u00a0in front of a Melbourne Cup crowd.", "\"It'd be good to be cheered home,\" McNeil said.", "\"And, hopefully, they can give him\u00a0a cheer for last year as well.\"", "The\u00a0British-trained galloper Spanish Mission\u00a0is considered\u00a0a threat to Incentivise but\u00a0VRC's executive general manager of racing, Leigh Jordon, said\u00a0the stallion could be challenged by the\u00a03,200-metre\u00a0race length.", "\"I'm going to go out on a limb and go with Spanish Mission,\" Mr Jordon said", "\"I think he is really a top-line stayer and may [beat]\u00a0Incentivise if there is any kink in his armour.\"", "Part-owners Bray Sokolski and Ozzie Kheir bought a stake in Incentivise earlier this year but, due to\u00a0COVID-19 restrictions, will only lay eyes on the gelding for the first time in the flesh when he\u00a0runs in the Cup.", "\"That hurts, because \u2026 what we love most about racing is horses and being around them,\" Mr Sokolski said.", "\"Hopefully, when things improve, we'll be able to go to Pakenham and spend a really good amount of time with him and pat him and \u2026\u00a0give him a carrot and a kiss.", "\"That's going to be really special.\"", "", "
Punters Aaron Fisher and Stephanie Young are trackside where tables have been set up on the lawn for a more organised affair.(ABC News: Dylan Anderson)
", "Mr Jordon\u00a0says the track will receive plenty of watering before the races begin.", "\"It will be perfect by the time the Cup is run at 3pm,\" he said."]
